data.name: Package Rush
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever had your package delayed? Would you like to fix it? In Package Rush you run your own delivery company.

Package Rush is a strategy game about planning a delivery route system in a fast-growing city. Build and modify routes to get all packages on time. How long you can keep delivering?



The city is growing. More and more orders are coming in, and there is less and less time to fulfill them. The demand for your company's services is growing. You'll be constantly managing your route system to meet the changing conditions and be as efficient as possible.

Key Features

  • Enjoy fun, relaxing, and sometimes hectic gameplay, where each game is unique
  • Build routes and think carefully about strategy
  • Choose from a variety of unique upgrades. The further you go, the more varied they become
  • Set records and compete with other players
  • Cute cartoon graphics
  • Wonderful soundtrack
